Constant Field Values
Method Detail

addPort

int addPort(Port port,
            int wireType)
Adds a new port (connection)

Returns:
The error code if any. e.g. ERROR_ALREADY_MAX_PORTS is returned if no more ports of type wireType can be handeled by this module.

getModuleUI

If the implementing class doesn't want to extend or create an object of ModuleUI then return null.
